title: Design Thinking-Based Business Model Innovation Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational business administration and marketing concepts
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments, focusing on applying design thinking methodologies to solve real business problems

learning_goals: Learners can generate new business models by applying the design thinking process based on real-world cases.
Learners gain practical skills to validate business model feasibility through prototyping and user feedback.
Learners acquire communication skills to materialize innovative solutions through collaboration with diverse stakeholders.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
